page.title: 20Hiltingbury - The People
page.content:
We did some surveys with the children in our Junior School. We have about 300 children and most of them have moved here from all over the United Kingdom and other parts of the World. Only 85 were born in Hiltingbury itself.
We asked the children about their Hobbies, their Pets, if they had a Computer, their favourite T.V. programme, their favourite Colour and their favourite book.
{The Results} {Hobbies} Football and Swimming {Pets} Fish were the favourite then Cats and Dogs {Computer}180 families owned a computer {T.V.} Dallas {Colour} Blue {Book} The B.F.G by Roald Dahl
